translation: Qryshn rghbt diyavnh kh vjh kinụ̄.
Āe tim srdy yan th grmy yan hndi (tjarty) sfrsintụ̄ ʿạdy bnavnh.
Lhādha pazi timn zi yymhi gr (khanh kʿbh) kis rb snz ʿbadt krin (takh tmụ̄ snz shkrgzạry spdi)
Yymụ̄ timn bochhhi (yʿny tngy th faqh kyn ḥalatn) mnz khyn diyut (yʿny rzq kornkh frahm) byyhi kornkh (dshmnn hndi) khvf nishhi aamn ʿṭa (yʿny mḥfvẓ th amn vajinụ̄ zndgy krnkh ʿṭa).
